dialog.text: The top half is sky and the bottom half is water.
The sky is blue with no clouds.
Is there anything in the water?
Yes, on the right half of the water, there are smears of water scattered around (mostly on the top half).
My bad, it is water. Replace the water (currently) with river.
Thank you! Is there anything along the horizon?
Yes, there is a mountain range going from left to right. Its top is mostly flat but jagged too.
The mountains should be a bit over the middle height. At its foot, there is a thin (very thin) layer of grass and tree (grass under, tree above) that goes from the right to almost the left.
Got it, can you peek to see how its looking so far?
Looks great but the trees and grass should go from the right to almost the left, not the other way around (you flipped it).
I had it drawn from right to almost left, but the render flipped it somehow. Updated it a bit anyway so that it renders more accurately!
